Not sure if this name is right. End of func sets the identified flag on item, can patch to make items drop as identified. (i.e. change `and dword ptr [rdx+18h], 0FFFFFFEFh` - 83 62 18 EF
 to `or     dword ptr [rdx+18h], 010h` - 83 4a 18 10
